featureDescription.name: spans
featureDescription.description: List of DisorderSpans associated with this DiseaseDisorder

featureDescription.name: attributes
featureDescription.description: List of DiseaseDisorderAttributes associated with this DiseaseDisorder

featureDescription.name: stype
featureDescription.description: UMLS Semantic Type, can be comma separated if there are multiple types

featureDescription.name: cuis
featureDescription.description: CUIs, originally just 1 CUI in original semeval 2015 data. Not associated with a particular span.
